member.name: T:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames
member.summary: Contains names of common particle parameters.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Alpha
member.summary: The particle opacity (0 = transparent, 1 = opaque). (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Angle
member.summary: The rotation angle in radians. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.AngularAcceleration
member.summary: The angular acceleration that changes the . (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.AngularSpeed
member.summary: The angular speed that changes the . (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.BillboardOrientation
member.summary: The particle billboard orientation. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: depends on the used particle renderer)

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.BlendState
member.summary: The blend state that should be used by the renderer. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: depends on the used particle renderer)

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Color
member.summary: The particle color. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Damping
member.summary: The damping factor that defines the strength of the damping. 0 means no damping. Higher values mean stronger damping. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Direction
member.summary: The normalized direction vector that defines the movement direction. (Parameter type: varying, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.DrawOrder
member.summary: The parameter that defines the draw order for particle systems on the same world space position. Particle systems with higher draw order value are drawn on top of particle systems with lower draw order. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.EmissionRate
member.summary: The emission rate that defines how many particles are generated in particles per second. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.EmitterVelocity
member.summary: The emitter velocity vector, usually used to modify the start velocity of particles. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Frame
member.summary: The index of the frame in an animated texture (or the index of a texture in a texture atlas). (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.IsDepthSorted
member.summary: The parameter that indicates if the particles in the particle system should be rendered depth-sorted. (Parameter type: uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Lifetime
member.summary: The lifetime of a particle in seconds. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.LinearAcceleration
F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.LinearSpeed
member.summary: The linear (scalar) speed along the vector. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.LinkedIndex
member.summary: The index of the next particle that this particle is connected to, for rendering ribbons (a.k.a. trails or lines). (Parameter type: varying, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Mass
member.summary: The particle mass. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.NormalizedAge
member.summary: The normalized age in the range [0, 1]. This parameter is created and managed by the class. (Parameter type: varying, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Position
member.summary: The particle position. (Parameter type: varying, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Resitution
member.summary: The coefficient of restitution (= bounciness) of a particle (0 = no bounce, 1 = full bounce, no energy is lost). (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Size
member.summary: The particle size. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.SizeX
member.summary: The particle size in x-direction. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.SizeY
member.summary: The particle size in y-direction. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: )

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterNames.Texture
member.summary: The particle texture. (Parameter type: varying or uniform, value type: depends on the used particle renderer)

member.name: T:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterUsage
member.summary: Describes if a particle effector reads and/or writes a particle parameter.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterUsage.In
member.summary: The particle parameter is read but not changed.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterUsage.Out
member.summary: The particle parameter is written. (Overwriting existing parameter values.)

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleParameterUsage.InOut
member.summary: The particle parameter is read and written.

member.name: T:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleReferenceFrame
member.summary: Defines which 3D coordinate system is used for vectors in particle parameters and particle effector properties.

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleReferenceFrame.World
member.summary: All parameters are relative to world space (which is the space in which the root particle system is placed).

member.name: F:DigitalRune.Particles.ParticleReferenceFrame.Local
member.summary: All parameters are relative to the local space of the particle system.
